message: We step into a cavernous space.
Three men are standing at its center. One is Toue.
The other two are Clear's copies.
So... that's Toue. It's my first time seeing him in the flesh.
On TV, he comes across as the perfect gentleman, but he doesn't have me fooled.
He may dress nice and all, but his eyes are cold. Piercing, like the eyes of a hawk.

name: 東江
message: "I'm glad you came, R-2E-054... or is it 'Clear' now? And you must be Aoba."
He knows my name. Those two must've told him.

name: 東江
message: "I've seen the reports. It appears that Clear has recognized you as his master."

name: 東江
message: "Now, I'm sure you're wondering why I invited you―and Clear, of course. To answer that, we should start with your friend."
Toue's gaze shifts to Clear.
Clear does not look happy.

name: 東江
message: "Clear is what we call an R-2E unit. But he was defective, so we disposed of him."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Disposed of him?!"

name: 東江
message: "Indeed. However, the man in charge of his disposal must have lost his mind. He took Clear and ran."

name: 東江
message: "He modified Clear, deactivating his transponder and concealing his face so we couldn't find him. The man lived with Clear until his death."

name: 東江
message: "He treated Clear like a son. Perhaps it was simply an act of lonely desperation. He was old, and had no children of his own."
Toue must be talking about Clear's "Grandpa." That explains the gas mask, and the rule against showing his face.

name: 東江
message: "Clear now recognizes you as his master. He has even gone so far as to fight his fellow R-2E units."
Toue glances at the two standing behind him.

name: 東江
message: "When I heard that you had claimed Aoba as your master, I must admit, it piqued my interest."

name: 東江
message: "I am each unit's master by default, yet somehow, you defied that programming in order to prioritize a misunderstanding."

name: 東江
message: "Why did you choose Aoba, of all people? Now that is the truly intriguing question..."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Clear...!"
Clear takes a step forward, his eyes still focused on Toue.

name: クリア
message: "...There's something I want to ask you."

name: 東江
message: "Oh?"
Toue's eyes narrow with curiosity, and he nods.

name: 東江
message: "By all means, ask."

name: クリア
message: "As my 'proper' master, I thought you would be the one to answer this question. Please tell me..."

name: クリア
message: "...if it's possible for us to become human."

name: 東江
message: "...Human?"
Toue grins, clearly amused.

name: 東江
message: "Am I to assume you mean in the physical sense?"

name: クリア
message: "Yes."

name: 東江
message: "Heh, fascinating. A machine that wants to be human."

name: 東江
message: "The answer is no, of course. But you knew that, didn't you? You're a machine. You can't become human."

name: クリア
message: "Then why did you make me―us―look so human?"

name: 東江
message: "Now that's even more surprising. A machine questioning its purpose? Most intriguing."

name: クリア
message: "Please answer the question."

name: 東江
message: "The answer is simple: you're more useful that way. You see, the plan is to integrate you into human society."

name: 東江
message: "You will blend seamlessly into their communities, all the while controlling them with your voice. Your appearance was designed to facilitate that."

name: 東江
message: "As the project continues, we will, of course, produce a variety of models, all the better to spread them across the world."

name: クリア
message: "...In other words, we may look exactly like humans, but you still treat us as tools."

name: 東江
message: "I suppose I can't blame you, if that's how you see it. For my part, I think of you as my children."

name: 東江
message: "Children who can be replaced, that is."

name: 東江
message: "Perhaps it is more accurate to say that I care dearly about you all as a whole, because you are necessary to my plan."

name: クリア
message: "Then I have another question for you, as my 'real' master."

name: クリア
message: "...Why are you alive?"
That's... the same question he asked me before.

name: 東江
message: "The meaning of life, eh?"

name: 東江
message: "To me, life is a game. The only game. A grand board where we wager it all against the whims of fate."

name: 東江
message: "If my convictions are true, then no matter what obstacles I face, I know that I will get what I want in the end."

name: 東江
message: "If instead I fail, then so be it. I did not meet the test of fate. To play this game is my greatest joy. I will continue for as long as I draw breath."

name: 東江
message: "That is what it means to be alive."
Clear doesn't say a word.
Instead, he balls his white-gloved hands into tight fists.

name: クリア
message: "...Then what does death mean to you, Master?"

name: 東江
message: "As I just said, losing the wager. When fate rejects my convictions, that is when I will die."

name: クリア
message: "...You're wrong."
Clear's fists begin to shake.

name: クリア
message: "Your answers don't make any sense. Everything I've seen and learned tells me that you're wrong!"

name: クリア
message: "If life is a game, then what does that make us?"

name: 東江
message: "Pieces, of course. Just as I am a piece. We are all pieces on the great board."

name: クリア
message: "...No! We're not pieces! We have wills of our own! We have emotions and thoughts, just like human beings! We're alive!"

name: クリア
message: "We're nobody's toys!"

name: 東江
message: "Oh, you just haven't realized it yet. I brought you into this world. You would not exist because of me. Am I wrong?"

name: クリア
message: "...Ngh. You really aren't my master."

name: クリア
message: "Aoba taught me so many important things. I learned what it means to be alive, and I learned what death is."

name: クリア
message: "I may not be human, but his words made me feel warm. They made me happy."

name: クリア
message: "I understand these things, and I'm not even human! But you don't understand anything! And you think you can control people... You're wrong!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Clear..."
I never knew my words meant so much to him...

name: 東江
message: "...Heh heh heh."
Toue chuckles.

name: 東江
message: "Anger, now? You really are fascinating. Perhaps bringing you here was not a waste of time after all."

name: 東江
message: "Yes... I believe this calls for a thorough analysis."
